COOFANDY Men's Button Down Shirt Short Sleeve Casual Shirt for Men Summer Business Casual Dress Shirt  My observations (see video):  Pro - Good fit. If I were going to wear this shirt in casual settings, I may have preferred XL, for a little more comfort. However, it works well for dressing up. A tie fits nicely under the collar, and is long enough to tuck in. - Good design. I'm glad this shirt is plain white, and doesn't feature any logos or embroidery.  Con - Plain front. Because I wear it with a tie, I would like a pocket.

I really like the look of the shirt. I'm very particular about the collars on my shirt and this one looks really great. I like the overall cut of it and how it has a bit more of a contemporary look to it. The sizing chart was accurate and it fits just right. This is a picture of the shirt before I washed it. After the wash, I have to admit that it did get a bit wrinkly, and therefore I needed to steam the shirt to get rid of the wrinkles. Therefore, if you are looking for a truly wrinkle free shirt, this would not be a good candidate. The fabric is very comfortable and I think it's just the right thickness for summer and fall weather. Overall I'm very satisfied with this shirt.

A good looking and comfortable button down short sleeve shirt. It has a shine to it but not too much, just enough to make it look quite nice in my opinion. Sizing was spot on, large was just right as I can be somewhere in between large or XL depending on the shirt.
I think this shirt would be great as part of a uniform for anyone in the service industry. Great price. OK looks
